acc.title: Setup Your Account
launch.title: Launch Your First Project
launch.desc: ORP provides the digital infrastructure for collecting, uploading, confirming, and visualizing reforestation data. ORP is an open-source and permissionless protocol for reforestation projects to transparently measure, report, and verify (MRV) the entire life cycle of their trees.
